name: Base Jumper (itch)
description:
Base Jumper is a local 4 player couch (or table) multiplayer involving all players using the same keyboard and trying to be the first to make the landing from their Base Jump whilst staying on target.

The game is a one week game made by 4 students from KADK, Copenhagen.  It's a local x 4 multiplayer game all using the one keyboard. 

Made by Murray Somerville / Laura Blicher / Mathias Pedersen / Ivan Ilko
